name: Rise & Chime - Canvas Print
description:
"Rise & Chime" | Canvas Print

A tribute to our favourite New Zealand bird. The cheeky Tui that wake us up every morning. A3 Stretched un-mounted cotton canvas print. Printed with genuine Vivera archival ink which, in the right conditions, is guaranteed to last at least 200 years without fading. Let's face it, this is going to look good much longer than you are.

name: Dreams Plant Seeds - Grey Kids Crew
description:
"Dreams Plant Seeds" | Kids Crew Neck

Treehouses, mudpies, long summers, exploring neighbourhoods, backyard building projects... childhood is crammed full of potential! The new Ethcs 'dreams plant seeds' design reminds us that our kidlets need to explore, to laugh, to get dirty, to wonder, and to imagine. These dreams are the things that take root and grow... Ethcs kids sweatshirts look good, but they're totally durable- so they're good for tree-climbing or for a spit-and-polish before Nana comes for tea. The inks are water-based, so they won't cause any extra toes to grow *and* they're good for both the dudes and the dudettes- no stock-standard pink and blue generics here!


Size chart and more info about our kids crews

name: Mens 'Once There Were' Five Hoodie
description:
'Once There Were Five' | Mens Hoodie

Laugh a hearty man laugh at the harsh New Zealand winter with this toasty Ethcs hoodie. 'Once There Were Five' - The legend of Mt. Taranaki. The abbreviated version goes like this; Originally there were 4 manly mountains- Taranaki, Tongariro, Ngauruhoe and Ruapehu and they were all pretty hot for the fine girl mountain in the area, Mount Pihanga. Naturally they fought for her affection, when the smoked cleared Mt. Tongariro emerged victorious, Taranaki, wild with grief and jealously fled through the night. Size chart and more info about our NZ mens hoodies

name: Womens 'Rise & Chime' T-shirt
description:
"Rise & Chime" | Womens T-shirt

If I was going to be a bird I reckon I'd be a Tui. They're crazy mofo's that always seem to be having fun and teasing our cat. If you love our favourite native bird as much as we do, this is the perfect NZ t-shirt for you. Size chart and more info about our womens t-shirts

name: Mens Contrast Zippa Hoodie
description:
Mens Contrast Zippa Hoodie

It's pretty flash with its two colour print, swanky white zipper and chunky white drawcord. This hoodie is an instant New Zealand clothing classic and that full length zip is like your very own built-in personal climate control system. Check out the anatomy of this typeface and observe the detail in the line work, creating shadows where the crossbars and stems intersect, adding depth where none should be found. Strickly for the boys though. Sorry ladies but we're sick you gettin' all the cool stuff. Size chart for our mens hoodies

name: Once There Were Five  Canvas print
description:
Once There Were Five | Canvas Print

Today we see three but once there were five. The legend of Mt. Taranaki. Based on the Maori myth of how Tongariro National Park was formed. The abbreviated version goes like this; Originally there were 4 manly mountains- Taranaki, Tongariro, Ngauruhoe and Ruapehu and they were all pretty hot for the fine girl mountain in the area, Mount Pihanga. Naturally they fought for her affection, when the smoked cleared Mt. Tongariro emerged victorious, Taranaki, wild with grief and jealously fled through the night. Available in A3 (420mm x 297mm) and A2 (594mm x 420mm) Stretched un-mounted canvas, printed with genuine Vivera ink which, in the right conditions, is guaranteed to last at least 200 years without fading. Let's face it, this piece of NZ Art is going to look good much longer than you are. Our canvas art prints ship every Monday. We print these on demand and each print requires 24-48 hours to dry before we package them up for shipping.

Each print ships with certificate of authenticity and signed letter with details of the artwork. Printed with genuine Vivera ink which, in the right conditions, is guaranteed to last at least 200 years without fading. Let's face it, this NZ Art is going to look good much longer than you are.

name: Shutterbug Canvas Print
description:
"Shutterbug" | Limited Edition Canvas Print

A true piece of NZ Art. One of our most popular t-shirts is now available as a limited edition canvas print. Shutterbug - A contemporary Maori design with an Ethcs twist. A3 Limited Edition Canvas - NZ Art Print Stretched un-mounted canvas, limited to just 100 prints each. Each print ships with certificate of authenticity and signed letter with details of the artwork. Printed with genuine Vivera ink which, in the right conditions, is guaranteed to last at least 200 years without fading. Let's face it, this piece of NZ Art is going to look good much longer than you are.

name: The Bird - Black Stash Bag
description:
Bird Stash Bag

We bagged the bird! New Ethcs Stash Bag. Check out our beautifully illustarted bird, note the little koru's that adorn the tail feathers. The bird is an Ethcs Clothing favourite. The stash bag is very similar to our original tote bag but better...much much better. With its velcro closure and hidden zip pocket, the stash bag means business. All our bags are made from heavy cotton canvas. They'll transport everything from your organic vegies to your Star Wars figurine collection or even one of those small dogs that people like to put clothes on. You know who you are! 100% cotton canvas, reinforced shoulder strap 42cm x 45cm (WxL)

name: Twin Pack Canvas Prints
description:
"Face the World" & "Shutterbug" | Twin Pack Limited Edition Canvas Prints

Pimp out your naked wall space with some Ethcs Limited Edition Canvas Art. Buy these two classic New Zealand Art pieces together and save $18. A3 Limited Edition Canvas Art Prints Stretched un-mounted canvas, both pieces limited to 100 prints each. Each print ships with certificate of authenticity and signed letter with details of the artwork. Printed with genuine Vivera ink which, in the right conditions, is guaranteed to last at least 200 years without fading. Let's face it, these are going to look good much longer than you are.

name: Roots Canvas Print
description:
"Roots" | Canvas Print

This who we are, this is where we come from. The Koru depicts new beginnings, growth and harmony. Available in A3 (420mm x 297mm) stretched un-mounted canvas and printed with genuine Vivera ink which, in the right conditions, is guaranteed to last at least 200 years without fading. Let's face it, this piece of NZ Art is going to look good much longer than you are. Our canvas art prints ship every Monday. We print these on demand and each print requires 24-48 hours to dry before we package them up for shipping.
